parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to delete all tags. This parameter takes effect only when the TagKey.N parameter is not specified. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. A maximum of 50 resource IDs can be specified.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   CLUSTER: MSE instance
*   GATEWAY: cloud-native gateway

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys. A maximum of 20 tag keys are supported.
